name: Client Onboarding Workflow
description: Complete client onboarding flow: form capture, CRM entry, info request, contract, welcome email, and team notification. Uses Notion as placeholder for ClickUp/CRM.
exampleUserInput: Help me onboard my clients automatically with forms, contracts, and welcome emails

params.subject: Welcome! We need a bit more info to get started
params.body:
Hi {{client_name}},

Thank you for signing up! To complete your onboarding, please provide the following:
- Company logo
- Billing address
- Primary contact

Reply to this email with the details.

Best regards

Hi {{client_name}},

Great news - your contract has been received and your account is now active!

2. Your dedicated account manager will reach out
